summary: COULD NOT PUT KEY IN IGNITION AND STEERING WHEEL LOCKED.  NEEDED TO HAVE CAR TOWED TO DEALER.  DEALERSHIP HAD A BRAND NEW REPLACMENT PART THEY TOLD ME WAS "DEFECTIVE" AND THEY HAD TO GO TO ANOTHER DEALER TO GET PART.  IGNITION SWITCH WAS COMPLETELY REPLACED AT A COST OF $260 +/-.  40,000 MILES ON CAR AND IS A 2000 WAGON MODEL.
